tag_list: collectordash, ami-pro, nokia, air2web, collector-actionfigures, collector-modeltrains
overview:
Bill is founder and CEO of CollectorDASH. He is great at leading teams of talented high tech people to attack good business opportunities and execute with creativity and customer focus.

He has a long history of innovation, from the early days of Windows (Ami word processor) to mobility (Nokia) to his latest endeavor, CollectorDASH. DASH is a disruptive ecommerce, social and mobile platform for communities of passionate collectors.
